Articles.Content:
I find the ancient Ban Hammer In The Temple of Ban

i Ban You for Bad Grammar Anyone Else Gets Banned for Stepping On my lawn

my Hill.

I eat your Ban Hammer and eat you

My hill

Tobbzzzz uses Arcane Bomb

theattackcorgi takes 9001 magic damage

theattackcorgi dies

My Hill (Muahahhahahahhahaha)

I am the gamemaster. You lose. 

My rp hill.

I stare at you until you get so creeped out that you leave.

My hill.

I kill you with love from ponies...

My hill

I buy some Aperture Science Sentry Turrets. I stick them in your hill.

My hill.

I set off an EMP in your hill.

My hill.
You have nothing but you defending your hill, its now mine and my army!

I release a horde from The Dark Portal

My hill and army of dark orcs

Call some B-2 bombers...

My cratter

Uses Hooligan Labs airballons to build a flying hill on Jool

My Hill ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I'll call my kraken, which lurk in the deppest level of Jool atmosphere

My inside-jool hill and kraken

I make a hill made from dirt. And its populated by corgis and all the worlds corgis live there and destroying it would be a evil act of malice and blah blah blah...

My Happy Corgi Hill

I... KILL IT WITH FIRE

my hill

I banish you forever to hell for that crime.

My hill of dead

I become god.../a saint

MY HILL

I eat you and delete your code.

My hill...

I call THE doctor

my hill

I call in a army of tardises and weeping angels

my anti doctor hill.

I lock the angels in a standoff with an army of SCP-173s and Endermen.

lolmine

I bring in the government and a shotgun

my hill

Insert Government lockout.

Ill bring in a shiny new SR72.
I build a hill and set up a perfectly peaceful space research center.

I nuke it from orbit, then build a space hill fortress.

My hill.
